Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI makes my learning more targeted, precise and efficient as opposed to from my teacher.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I feel as though I am progressing more at my own pace, instead of how the teacher would like me to progress.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI focuses more on the details of what I am talking about, as compared to a teacher focusing on how I am writing those details out in order to gain full marks.
